title: Copper plumbing
creator_credit: Cine Service Productions and Geoffrey Thompson
brief_description: The development and use of prefabricated copper plumbing in Australia. The advantages of seamless copper tubing, enabling workshop assembly of plumbing units; how copper plumbing can be concealed in walls; how architect, builder and plumber can plan ahead together; how these techniques have been used in a number of Australian public buildings, offices, blocks of flats, and small homes.
